reviewText: This item came with a sticker that said will not play on most American DVDs players why the heck are they shipping it in America
When purchased wasn't advertised as a Region 2 DVD, offered to return it but at a cost that exceeded the initial cost of the movie.
Pleased with U.K. copy. Played great in our region free dvd player.

This movie was a Christmas gift and so after they opened it we went to watch it...it WOULDNT PLAY because our DVD player is a normal US dvd player ...not a region free dvd player... I thought all movies that were dvds (with the exception of blue ray) would play in a normal sony dvd player...but apparently there are movies made in Britin ect. that are different regions so you have to buy a region free dvd player to never have this problem...Horrible!!! Won't even Begin to load the disk....won't play.... I am super disappointed because my boys really wanted this movie...The seller should have warned that it wouldn't play in a standard US dvd player!!
Have to return cause it won't play why put it out for sell when you know it Wil not play in American.
Having to return dvd , will not play on any DVD player.
IT WONT PLAY MOVIE IN MY AREA
This needs to be returned, because, a surprise to me, this DVD, like the old video tapes, is on a different operating system - British it seems, and will not play.
